metadata.title: USN-4696-1 -- HTMLDOC vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that HTMLDOC incorrectly handled certain HTML files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4696-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  htmldoc - 1.8.27-8ubuntu1.1 htmldoc-common - 1.8.27-8ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
